import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Container, Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import products from '../product'; import './CartPage.css'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import { addToCart } from '../actions/cartActions'; export function CartPage({ match, location, history}) { const productId = match.params.id const qty = location.search ? Number(location.search.split('=')[1]) : 1; const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { if(productId) { dispatch(addToCart(productId, qty)) } }, [dispatch, productId, qty]) const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const cartItems = cart.cartItems; console.log('cartItems:', cartItems) /*const productsInCart = products.slice(0,2); let priceSum = 0; productsInCart.map(product => { priceSum = priceSum + product.price; }) */ let priceSum = 0; return (

{product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock": "Out of stock"}

Subtotal

${priceSum}

Free shipping to V8N3R9, arrive on Thu Sep 21, 2021
